channel.title: AMS:ASML on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AMS:ASML on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Europe Stocks Muted After Disappointing ASML, Renault Results
item.description: European stocks were muted as investors responded to a slate of disappointing earnings reports, including from ASML Holding NV and Renault SA.

item.title: Europe Stocks Muted After Disappointing ASML, Renault Results
item.description: European stocks were muted as investors responded to a slate of disappointing earnings reports, including from ASML Holding NV and Renault SA.

item.title: ASML Walks Back 2026 Growth Forecast as Tariffs Muddy Outlook
item.description: ASML Holding NV Chief Executive Officer Christophe Fouquet walked back the company’s growth forecast for next year due to trade disputes, even though second-quarter orders beat estimates.

item.title: ASML Walks Back 2026 Growth Forecast as Tariffs Muddy Outlook
item.description: ASML Holding NV Chief Executive Officer Christophe Fouquet walked back the company’s growth forecast for next year due to trade disputes, even though second-quarter orders beat estimates.

item.title: ASML Walks Back 2026 Growth Outlook as Tariffs Muddy Outlook
item.description: ASML Holding NV Chief Executive Officer Christophe Fouquet walked back the company’s growth forecast for next year due to trade disputes and global tensions.
